org.axiondb.jdbc
Interface AxionBlob

All Superinterfaces:
Blob
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractAxionBlob, ByteArrayBlob
public interface AxionBlob
extends Blob

The JDBC Blob interface, including the JDBC 2 writing methods.

Version:
$Revision: 1.4 $ $Date: 2002/12/16 23:34:55 $
